column5: ~~~Heading out agin after the Perch, love those tasty widdle creatures, can't keep them in the freezer long enough to stock up. Launching at the Everglade Marina, on both days at about 8:00. Just wondering if anyone else comen out to play, weather not to bad light breeze from the NW at 20, with temp up as high as balmy 11
Was out yesterday for some perch...further up the lake though....so guess what's for supper tonight?  Perch are my absolute favourite freshwater fish. Good luck at getting a feed or two for yourself.
